programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1892
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep31
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - Black Leopard. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of Black Leopard, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the masters granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.desc: Speechless On The Seine - While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Poles Apart - A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Show Don't Tell - Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Don't Touch - Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Big In Japan - During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Swamp Monster! - Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang meet up with basketball legend and bowling aficionado Chris Paul at a golf tournament fundraiser held in Florida.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Peebles' Pet Shop Of Terrible Terrors! - Scooby and the gang meet Wanda Sykes.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Scooby Of A Thousand Faces! - When a marble statue comes to life at a museum in Greece our gang is caught between a braying minotaur and a sword-wielding Wonder Woman!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer - The Lion is named King of the Forest now he has his medal of courage. Will his trek over water, darkness and spiders be too much for this scaredy cat? Or will he learn the real meaning of courage?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ojo The Unlucky - While making cookies Dorothy accidentally pours the Potion of Life into the mixing bowl, causing disaster! Dorothy must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lion's Share - A love magnet is a great Valentine's Day gift but it magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy, overwhelming her. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Rules Of Attraction - Dorothy and the gang take Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse. But too late they realise the origins of his name and they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Brain Power Of Love - Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices after playfully calling out 'jinx!' Now they must travel to the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Jinxed - The Scarecrow just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker, Patchwork Girl. So Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep1
programme.desc: I Wish He Were Still Here - When Daniel and Ruby OReilly move to the orchard home theyve inherited from Daniels eccentric uncle, the place seems inhospitable - until Ruby makes a discovery that changes everything: a magic well that feeds her cryptic visions of unfulfilled wishes.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot - Professor of behavioral science Alec Mercer is called upon to investigate the murder of a fashion influencer whose boyfriend, a decorated soldier and son of a Senator, has confessed to the crime. Mercer suspects there is more to the story than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep2
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking - Alec is approached by his old friend CJ, a prominent investigative journalist, who asks for his help after she is poisoned with rare and deadly nerve agent. With time running out, Mercer pieces together scant clues.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep3
programme.desc: The Barnum Effect - After a passenger plane crashes into the Potomac, suspicions focus immediately on the pilot. Alec and the team are asked to investigate the pilots personal motivations and piece together clues in the hopes of revealing the truth.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep4
programme.desc: Zero Sum - Alec and the team take on a kidnapping case at the request of a desperate father. Their investigation is hampered by a complicated family dynamic that slowly reveals everyones hidden motivations.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky Charms - Alec and the team head to Las Vegas to help Camille, a former colleague turned expert poker player whos been lured into danger. They must take some risks to solve a gambling mystery before Camille gets hurt. Marisa makes a significant discovery.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep6
programme.desc: Point And Shoot - Alec agrees to testify as an expert witness in a wrongful death trial for a friend of Kylies. As he faces an old nemesis, he discovers competing emotions around an accidental shooting. Marisa reaches a decision about the bombing investigation.

programme.title: Making It S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Best Friends - From executive producers and hosts Amy Poehler and Nick Offerman comes a lighthearted competition celebrating the creativity and craftiness in all of us. Each week, a group of Makers from all over the country will compete in two handmade projects one timed, the other themed cleverly designed by Amy and Nick to test the Makers' ability to get creative. Each challenge will bring out their skills and insights, as well as their touching personal stories and, of course, plenty of laughter and fun for everyone. Then, in the end, one talented artisan will be crowned "Master Maker."

programme.title: Equator From The Air S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Pacific - Crossing the Pacific, Gordon discovers how a view from above is helping protect hammerhead sharks and giant tortoises, and what it could reveal about the future of our coral reefs.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Galapagos - Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.title: The World's Most Luxurious Airline

programme.desc: Discover how engineers built Zaha Hadid's Antwerp Port House, find out how 432 Park Avenue New York was built and marvel at Kengo Kuma's Victoria & Albert Museum in Dundee, Scotland.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Beyond The Great Wall - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of th

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Venice, Albania and Turkey - Joanna starts her adventure in Venice, the European terminus of the Silk Road where she discovers how the Silk Road helped the merchants of Venice and the city state itself grow rich and powerful.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Making Money - The ancient powers must get rich by trading their treasures and monetising their assets. Who will succeed in the world of commerce?

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Lakes - Robson Green heads to exotic world locations to challenge locals at catching some of the strangest fish. In this episode he heads to the Great Lakes.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Sanctuary Ep5
programme.desc: Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Migration Ep6
programme.desc: Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds even thousands of individuals.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Surrogate Families Ep1
programme.desc: Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals well meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Heidelberg Ep1
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Carcassonne Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexicos forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds even thousands of individuals.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Predjama Ep3
programme.desc: Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Damning Truth Ep6
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds even thousands of individuals.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality Ep2
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know theyre not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombias high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Warriors of the Llanos Ep3
programme.desc: The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Finding a Family Ep4
programme.desc: Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Romeo and Julieta Ep5
programme.desc: This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. Shes about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeos calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality Ep2
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the regions wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead Ep8
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Cambodia: Hidden Refuges Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centers baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Social Ep3
programme.desc: Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias stink bombs; honey badgers savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep13
programme.desc: Star - Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep14
programme.desc: Pigs - Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers to get them out of town.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep10
programme.desc: Fake Ravine - When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep10
programme.desc: Oh's Party Of Slumber / Paranoid Activity - Oh throws a slumber party to take his friendship game to the next level with Tip's classmates/Kyle will do whatever it takes to keep Oh accident-free.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia / Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep10
programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 1 - The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships and to learn exactly what the ships are.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep19
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter Two - On a quest to find the power gem of fire, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Hawaii. programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep20
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter Three - Rocky and Bullwinkle battle one more guardian to get the final power gem the wind gem. programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep22
programme.desc: Secret Agent Sherman/Alexander Cartwright - When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep23
programme.desc: Sherman Exchange Program/Charles Dickens - Sherman trades places with a kid Emperor and learns that being king is harder than it seems and Peabody's new co-host is out of control

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep3
programme.desc: Wad of Friendship/Twig Puts Down Roots - Berry and Rocksy are thrilled about spending every waking moment together when they get stuck to the same piece of gum, but as more people join their gum ball, things spiral out of control. \ When Twig begins to root, he thinks his dreams of becoming a Mighty Oak Tree are finally coming true! But as the Mighty Ones observe his "roots" growing in a weird and gross manner, they try to convince Twig that maybe things aren't what they seem.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep4
programme.desc: Egg Nag/Game On - The Mighty Ones accidentally knock a bird's Egg out of its nest and must take turns trying to incubate the incredibly annoying Egg until it hatches. / The Mighty Ones move into a board game in the yard that they believe to be a "city," and it's all fun and games until Berry's capitalist greed gets the best of her.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, its up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Sleep-Walk / Of Course You Can - When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid shell embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return of the Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnt sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. programme.desc: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game - King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep15
programme.desc: Luck - A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep16
programme.desc: Dragon - Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep11
programme.desc: New Tail - D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a raceloser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep11
programme.desc: Angerdome / Tush Twins - Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the Tush Twins.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep24
programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets / Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep25
programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh / Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Grug and Sandy get competitive when town members encroach on their treasure hunting/Gran convinces Grug that she controls the weather, but the power goes to her head when all of Ahhh! Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lorelai's Bracelet / Cecelia And The Ghost Ship - Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form! // Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep127
programme.desc: The Shiniest Shell / Match Set / Dad's Day Off - Bossy and Turtle try to keep Turtle's shell shiny for the school photo. // Bissy and Ginger are twins for a day! But when Ginger changes her mind, Bissy worries they'll no longer be friends. // Bossy goes a bit overboard helping his dad realx.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups redden een gekke klimmer - Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Super Hero Teacher - Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep148
programme.desc: An Endless Story - Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hot Potato - Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Runaway Hamster Ball / The Perfectinator - Steel accidentally uses the growth ray on Stu and Safia's pet hamster, turning her into a giant stomping hamster! // Steel and Lady Fluffpot get involved in a tidying robot one-up-manship battle when Kai makes Botler the tidiest robot in the city.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep26

programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Costa Georgiadis meets an inspiring gardener, Tino Carnevale sows spring crops indoors, Josh Byrne visits a landscape designer, Jane Edmanson visits a stunning garden in rural Victoria and Millie Ross builds a garden bench.

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - It's all about Community this week, with teens and seniors taking part in a range of activities to celebrate the community they've created and help those most in need.

programme.title: Landline Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The entrepreneurial farmer determined to stay on his remote property despite incredible adversity; Scaling up production to get more jackfruit onto plates; plus shifting years of accumulated dung from under woolsheds.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Hamilton Japanese Queenslander Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Steve Minon has a fascination for things Japanese. He fell in love with the work of an iconic Japanese architect Yo Shimada, who he contacted to design a house for him.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path - Dr Luis Mata - Ecologist & Photographer Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - For Australian Pollinator Week, we meetphotographer and ecologistDrLuis Matawhosekeen eye forinsectsputs them in a whole new light.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep64
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep33
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: The Business Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World Ep37
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of today's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: Back Roads - Eugowra Recovery, NSW Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - We return to Eugowra, one of the first towns Back Roads visited when the pandemic hit in 2020. Two years later, it was almost wiped out by a flash flood. Heather discovers how they survived and what's driving their recovery.

programme.title: Q+A Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 17 - On the panel this week: Minister for Finance Katy Gallagher; Liberal MP for Menzies Keith Wolahan; lawyer, community advocate and writer Nyadol Nyuon; author Nathan Thrall plus Communications advisor and analyst Sabine Wolff.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep33
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Little Charo

programme.desc: Visit Izumo, Shimane, the setting of several Japanese myths, to meet a mischievous kitty living on a farm near Hii River. Then head to a pottery factory to see a blue-eyed cat hard at work.

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Iwate Prefecture is home to many historic sites which were made to represent Buddhist paradise. Catch a glimpse of eternity through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev
programme.desc: Prelims - The heavyweights take center stage at the APEX on Sunday, March 3, when unbeaten rising star Shamil Gaziev looks to smash his way into the Top 15 when he faces noted knockout artist Jairzinho Rozenstruik in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in 12 pro fights, Bahrains Gaziev kept the momentum going from his win on Dana Whites Contender Series with a knockout of Martin Buday, and now hell tackle the equally imposing Rozenstruik, who has scored knockouts in all seven of his UFC wins, stopping Junior Dos Santos, Alistair Overeem and Andrei Arlovski in the process
